content: It looks like the www.rust-lang.org website hasn't been deployed in a while (the deploy branch hasn't been updated since May 21).
It looks like there are some styling glitches with staging, is that what is holding it up?
@Camelid The website is currently deployed manually. If there are bugs on staging please report them on the issue tracker.
@XAMPPRocky Okay, I just did: https://github.com/rust-lang/www.rust-lang.org/issues/1173
